parameters.name: PFilletItem
parameters.description: Vertex at which to set the radius

parameters.name: Radius
parameters.description: Radius of the symmetric fillet at the vertex specified by PFilletItem; Distance 1 radius of the asymmetric fillet at the vertex

title: IVariableFilletFeatureData2.SetRadius
description: Sets the value of the Distance 1 radius at the specified vertex.
signature:
void SetRadius( 
   System.Object
PFilletItem
,
   System.Double
Radius
)

parameters.name: PFilletItem
parameters.description: Vertex at which to set the radius

parameters.name: Radius
parameters.description: Radius of the symmetric fillet at the vertex specified by PFilletItem; Distance 1 radius of the asymmetric fillet at the vertex

remarks:
Call
IVariableFilletFeatureData2::SetDistance
to set the Distance 2 radius at the vertex for the asymmetric fillet.
See
Accessing Selections that Define Features
for additional details.
